title: subgrid
subtitle: My First Learning Note
intro: Welcome to my Learning Journal a space where I document what I’ve learned, explored, and created.  Here you’ll find reflections, experiments, and insights I’ve gained throughout my studies and projects.
content: Welcome to I Love Web a personal space where I collect everything I learn, build, and experiment with on the web. Here you’ll find my learning notes, creative experiments, and projects that reflect my growth as a designer and developer. It’s a mix of curiosity, exploration, and a deep love for the web.
